comments: The coefficients of the partner polynomials are found in triangle A055864.
formula: a(n, m)=0 if n<m; a(0, 0)=1, a(n, 0)= n^n, n >= 1, a(n, m)= n^(m-1)*(n+1)^(n-m+1), n >= m >= 1;E.g.f. for column m: A(m, x); A(0, x)= 1/(1+W(-x)); A(1, x)= -1-diff(W(-x), x) = -1-W(-x)/((1+W(-x))*x); A(2, x)=A(1, x)-int(A(1, x), x)/x-(1/x+x); recursion: A(m, x) = A(m-1, x)-int(A(m-1, x), x)/x-((m-1)^(m-1))*(x^(m-1))/(m-1)!, m >= 3; W(x) principal branch of Lambert's function.
mathematica: a[n_, m_] /; n < m = 0; a[0, 0] = 1; a[n_, 0] := n^n; a[n_, m_] := n^(m-1)*(n+1)^(n-m+1); Table[a[n, m], {n, 0, 8}, {m, 0, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jun 20 2013 *)
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 20 2000
